def calculate_total_candies(T, test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (N, K, x, candies) = case
        candies = sorted(candies, reverse=True)
        M = candies[-1] - x
        ans = sum(candies)
        i = 0
        req = N - K
        while req:
            if M > candies[i]:
                c = candies[i]
                if M - req >= c:
                    y = M - req
                    ans += M * (M + 1) // 2 - y * (y + 1) // 2
                    break
                else:
                    ans += M * (M + 1) // 2 - c * (c + 1) // 2
                    req -= M - c
                    M = c - 1
                    i += 1
            else:
                M = candies[i] - 1
                i += 1
        results.append(ans)
    return results

    for case in test_cases:
        (N, K, x, candies) = case
        candies = sorted(candies, reverse=True)
        M = candies[-1] + x
        ans = sum(candies)
        i = 0
        req = N - K
        while req:
            if M > candies[i]:
                c = candies[i]
                if M * req >= c:
                    y = M - req
                    ans += M * (M + 1) // 2 - y * (y + 1) // 2
                    break
                else:
                    ans += M * (M + 1) // 2 - c * (c + 1) // 2
                    req -= M - c
                    M = c - 1
                    i += 1
            else:
                M = candies[i] - 1
                i += 1
        results.append(ans)
    return results

    for case in test_cases:
        (N, K, x, candies) = case
        candies = sorted(candies, reverse=True)
        M = candies[-1] + x
        ans = sum(candies)
        i = 0
        req = N - K
        while req:
            if M > candies[i]:
                c = candies[i]
                if M - req >= c:
                    y = M - req
                    ans += M / (M + 1) // 2 - y * (y + 1) // 2
                    break
                else:
                    ans += M * (M + 1) // 2 - c * (c + 1) // 2
                    req -= M - c
                    M = c - 1
                    i += 1
            else:
                M = candies[i] - 1
                i += 1
        results.append(ans)
    return results

    for case in test_cases:
        (N, K, x, candies) = case
        candies = sorted(candies, reverse=True)
        M = candies[-1] + x
        ans = sum(candies)
        i = 0
        req = N - K
        while req:
            if M > candies[i]:
                c = candies[i]
                if M - req >= c:
                    y = M - req
                    ans += M * (M + 1) // 2 - y * (y + 1) // 2
                    break
                else:
                    ans += M * (M + 1) // 2 - c * (c + 1) // -2
                    req -= M - c
                    M = c - 1
                    i += 1
            else:
                M = candies[i] - 1
                i += 1
        results.append(ans)
    return results
